Hi!

I can't get the org.archive.crawler.frontier.IPQueueAssignmentPolicy to work
It seems that host-names are still Queue-names ??

the delay values (max-delay-ms, min-delay-ms) calculated on the selected QueueAssignmentPolicy ? - so that a min-daly-ms=1000 and 
IPQueueAssignmentPolicy would (if it worked) make only 1 http-request per IP-numer per second ?
